## Spatial Provision of Urban Parks

Assess the spatial provision of urban parks to residential buildings city-wide. Refer to [package website](https://ecological-cities.github.io/home2park/) and [prototype web app]() for demonstrations of how the package may be used. The package supplements the following study: 

## Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ecological-cities/home2park")
```

## Setup

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(home2park)
```

```{r include = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
devtools::load_all() # to knit manually
```
